<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Many Guises](/Feats.aspx?ID=6883) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Tian Xia Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=230) pg. 50

**Prerequisites**
[Shifting Faces](/Feats.aspx?ID=2626)

</column>

---

You can use [Shifting Faces](/Feats.aspx?ID=2626) three times per day instead of once per day.
name: Many Guises
